title: QBFT chain with shanghai fork configured fails to validate blocks
body:
### Description
As a Besu/QBFT user I wish to upgrade to the shanghai fork by setting `shanghaiTime` to a future block timestamp

### Acceptance Criteria
After the configured `shanghaiTime` block time, the chain continues to operator and blocks are validated as expected.

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)

1. Create a 4 node Besu/QBFT chain with the `londonBlock` set to 0
2. Start the chain
3. After a few blocks have been validated, stop all of the nodes
4. Update the `genesis.json` with a `shanghaiTime` set to a few minutes in the future
5. Restart all of the nodes
6. Wait for the `shanghaiTime` to be reached, and observe failed block proposals
